code: import*as actionType from'../constants/actionTypes';const authReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{authData:null};let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case actionType.AUTH:localStorage.setItem('profile',JSON.stringify({...(action===null||action===void 0?void 0:action.data)}));return{...state,authData:action.data,loading:false,errors:null};case actionType.AUTH_ERROR:return{...state,error:action.payload};case actionType.LOGOUT:localStorage.clear();return{...state,authData:null,loading:false,errors:null};default:return state;}};export default authReducer;
